pageTitle: Route ideas for Explore London ticket holders
description: Day trip and cycle route ideas for Explore London ticket holders

breadcrumbs.title: Route ideas for Explore London ticket holders

title.title: Route ideas for Explore London ticket holders

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Buy a joint or combined Explore London ticket and have a day out exploring London by bike, river and cable car. Here are some routes to help you make the most of your ticket."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Explore London joint ticket route ideas"}
With an Explore London joint ticket , you can discover London by Santander Cycles bike and MBNA Thames Clippers River bus.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Route 1: Exploring Maritime Greenwich, Canary Wharf and the Isle of Dogs"}

Take the River Bus to Greenwich, where you'll spend the morning exploring. Then go on a Santander Cycles bike ride to explore Canary Wharf and the Isle of Dogs, before getting a River Bus back to central London.
Download the cycle route:

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Santander Cycles Leisure Route - Discover the Isle of Dogs","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/isle-of-dogs-leisure-route.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 400KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Route 2: Exploring the Tower of London, the Docklands and Canary Wharf"}

Take the River Bus to the Tower of London, then go on a Santander Cycles bike ride to explore London's historic Docklands. Have dinner or drinks in Canary Wharf, before taking a sunset River Bus back to central London.
Download the cycle route:

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Santander Cycles Leisure Route - Historic Docklands \u0026 Skyscrapers","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/docklands-and-skyscrapers-leisure-route.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 390KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Explore London combined ticket route ideas"}
With an Explore London combined ticket , you can discover London by Santander Cycles bike, MBNA Thames Clippers River bus and Emirates Air Line cable car.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Route 1: Exploring the Tower of London, the Docklands and enjoying sunset on the Emirates Air Line cable car"}

Catch the River Bus to the Tower of London, before hiring a Santander Cycles bike to explore the historic Docklands area. From Canary Wharf catch a River Bus to North Greenwich, before taking a sunset flight on the Emirates Air Line cable car.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Santander Cycles Leisure Route - Time and Tides","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/time-and-tides-leisure-route.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 664KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Route 2: Exploring Borough Market, London Bridge and Bankside, cycling through Westminster, and a flight on the Emirates Air Line"}

Catch the River Bus to North Greenwich, and take a flight on the Emirates Air Line cable car, before getting a River Bus to London Bridge. Explore the London Bridge and Bankside area, then go on a Santander Cycles bike ride along the river to Westminster.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Santander Cycles Leisure Routes: The River Thames and Changing the Guard","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/river-thames-and-changing-the-guard-leisure-route.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 2.53MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Other things to see and do along the Thames"}
There are lots of interesting places to visit along the river near MBNA Thames Clippers piers. There are Santander Cycles docking stations near all the piers apart from Greenwich and North Greenwich.
Here is a list of attractions near the piers to help you plan what you want to see and do:
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Millbank Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Tate Britain art gallery"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Westminster Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Houses of Parliament","Westminster Abbey","Churchill War Rooms","Buckingham Palace and St James's Park","Whitehall, 10 Downing Street and Horse Guards Parade"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Eye Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["London Eye"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Embankment and Festival Piers"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Southbank Centre","National Theatre","BFI Southbank (British Film Institute)","Gabriel's Wharf","Oxo Tower"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Bankside Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Shakespeare's Globe Theatre","Tate Modern art gallery"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"London Bridge City Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Borough Market","Southwark Cathedral","The Shard","Hay's Galleria","Bermondsey Street and the Fashion and Textile Museum","HMS Belfast","Tower Bridge"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Tower Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Tower of London","Leadenhall Market and Lloyds of London (1 Lime Street)","Monument"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"St Katharine's Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["St Katharine Docks","Historic docks and waterfront including Tobacco Dock and Shadwell Basin"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Canary Wharf Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Canary Wharf and the Isle of Dogs","Museum of London Docklands"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Masthouse Terrace Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Canary Wharf and the Isle of Dogs","Mudchute Park and City Farm"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Greenwich Pier"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Old Royal Naval College","Greenwich Market","Cutty Sark","National Maritime Museum","The Royal Observatory and Peter Harrison Planetarium","Greenwich Park","Greenwich Foot Tunnel to Canary Wharf and the Isle of Dogs"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"North Greenwich Pier"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Emirates Air Line cable car and Aviation Experience exhibition","The Crystal Sustainable Cities exhibition","The O2 Arena"]}
